import React,{useContext,useSelector} from 'react'; import BreadCrumb from '../BreadCumb' import {GlobalState} from '../../../GlobalState' import { Row, Col } from 'antd'; import PostItem from '../posts/Posts' import { htmlToText } from 'html-to-text'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import moment from 'moment'; import Aos from 'aos' import "aos/dist/aos.css" function Posts() { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [posts, setPosts] = state.myPostsAPI.posts const [topics] = state.topicsAPI.topics console.log('state all post.js') console.log(posts) return ( <>

Tin Tức

{ posts.map((post) => (
{moment(post.updatedAt).format('MM/DD/YYYY')}{topics.find(_=>_._id === post.topic).name || ""}
{post.title}

{post.description}

Read more

{post.userName}

)) }
); } export default Posts;
